synopsis.text: While struggling to care for a toy poodle left behind by his ex-girlfriend, Miyu Samura's life takes a drastic turn when he crosses paths with Shinichiro Niwa, a talented dog trainer. Captivated by Niwa's remarkable abilities, Miyu becomes his assistant at Proud Dog, a dog training studio. As he learns the ropes of dog training, Miyu discovers the profound bond between humans and their canine companions. Alongside pet groomer Ritsuka and vet Suzunosuke, Miyu embarks on a journey of personal growth and professional development, helping families and their dogs along the way. Despite Niwa's lack of interpersonal skills, Miyu remains committed to reviving his mentor's struggling business and becoming a skilled dog trainer in his own right.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
